ygData.subject: Re: Return to the base (Prometheus)
ygData.msgSnippet: Tyrael sat down at the opposite end of the projector and pressed a button. Light started to glow at the base of the display. As the Major punched some keys,

Tyrael sat down at the opposite end of the projector and pressed a
button. Light started to glow at the base of the display. As the Major
punched some keys, the image of a tough looking bot formed.

Tyrael: This is, or rather was, my predecessor. I executed him on
orders of the Tripredacus council for his incompetence at keeping the
Predacon Renegade Megatron. Megatron escaped his Maximal jailors and
was pursued by them here. I was ordered to lead the Tripredacus
Strikers and to capture or terminate the criminal. You see, he is
unpredictable and dangerous. He could have threatened our plans, but,
fortunately, his absence from Cybertron only made it better.

He punched another key. It showed the battle in which the renegade had
fused, right in front of his former ship.

Tyrael: While I was here trying to get Megatron, the Council decided
to act. Led by General Blackheart, our forces conquered Cybertron with
much ease. The Maximal Council got bogged down and they were either
eradicated or they fled. Here, however, Megatron fused with Galvatron
himself, leading to the creation of Hydras. He is a wicked one, and my
goal is still to take him out.

Once again, the image changed. It was the battle at Maximal Base,
where he had lost his ship.

Tyrael: As you can see, my first command was lost. I was soon joined
by General Blackheart himself and some of his most elite troops. Alas,
the General seems to have ceased all functions some time ago. I took
command and am now the Tripredacus leader. With the fall of Cybertron,
though, our goal has changed. We will eradicate every bot on this
planet who does not willingly join us. The Rogues are a particularly
pesky band, and I would like to blast them all first, but that will be
seen later.

Once again
